experiments.name: CoKG-RAG-Full
experiments.command: python hybrid_rag_query.py --input datasets/训练数据_基础社会法_600条.json --output /newdataf/SJ/LeanRAG/datasets/ablation_4_SocialLawQA /cokg-rag-full.json --llm-model /newdatad/WHH/MyEmoHH/models/Qwen2-7B-Instruct

experiments.name: Ablation-Retrieval-Only
experiments.description: 消融1：只用检索一致性评估
experiments.command: python hybrid_rag_query.py --input datasets/训练数据_基础社会法_600条.json --output /newdataf/SJ/LeanRAG/datasets/ablation_4_SocialLawQA /ablation-retrieval-only.json --llm-model /newdatad/WHH/MyEmoHH/models/Qwen2-7B-Instruct --use-retrieval-only

experiments.name: Ablation-Intrinsic-Only
experiments.description: 消融2：只用问题本质评估
experiments.command: python hybrid_rag_query.py --input datasets/训练数据_基础社会法_600条.json --output /newdataf/SJ/LeanRAG/datasets/ablation_4_SocialLawQA /ablation-intrinsic-only.json --llm-model /newdatad/WHH/MyEmoHH/models/Qwen2-7B-Instruct --use-intrinsic-only

experiments.name: Ablation-Fixed-TopK
experiments.command: python hybrid_rag_query.py --input datasets/训练数据_基础社会法_600条.json --output /newdataf/SJ/LeanRAG/datasets/ablation_4_SocialLawQA /ablation-fixed-topk.json --llm-model /newdatad/WHH/MyEmoHH/models/Qwen2-7B-Instruct --fixed-topk

experiments.name: Ablation-Flat-KG
